theorem smul_nonpos_of_nonpos_of_nonneg (hc : c ≤ 0) (ha : 0 ≤ a) : «expr • » c a ≤ 0 :=

/- can be generalized from `module k M` to `distrib_mul_action_with_zero k M` once it exists.
where `distrib_mul_action_with_zero k M`is the conjunction of `distrib_mul_action k M` and
`smul_with_zero k M`.-/
theorem smul_neg_iff_of_pos (hc : 0 < c) : «expr • » c a < 0 ↔ a < 0 :=
  by
  rw [← neg_neg a, smul_neg, neg_neg_iff_pos, neg_neg_iff_pos]
  exact smul_pos_iff_of_pos hc
#align smul_neg_iff_of_pos smul_neg_iff_of_pos

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Binary strict **rearrangement inequality**. -/
theorem smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul' [covariant_class M M (· + ·) (· < ·)] [contravariant_class M M (· + ·) (· < ·)]
    {a b : k} {c d : M} (hba : b < a) (hdc : d < c) : «expr • » a d + «expr • » b c < «expr • » a c + «expr • » b d :=
  by
  rw [add_comm («expr • » a d), add_comm («expr • » a c)]
  exact smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul hba hdc
#align smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul' smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul'
smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Binary strict **rearrangement inequality**. -/
theorem smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul [covariant_class M M (· + ·) (· < ·)] [contravariant_class M M (· + ·) (· < ·)]
    {a b : k} {c d : M} (hab : a < b) (hcd : c < d) : «expr • » a d + «expr • » b c < «expr • » a c + «expr • » b d :=
  by
  obtain ⟨b, rfl⟩ := exists_add_of_le hab.le
  obtain ⟨d, rfl⟩ := exists_add_of_le hcd.le
  rw [smul_add, add_right_comm, smul_add, ← add_assoc, add_smul _ _ d]
  rw [lt_add_iff_pos_right] at hab hcd
  exact add_lt_add_left (lt_add_of_pos_right _ <| smul_pos hab hcd) _
#align smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul smul_add_smul_lt_smul_add_smul
smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Binary **rearrangement inequality**. -/
theorem smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul' [contravariant_class M M (· + ·) (· ≤ ·)] {a b : k} {c d : M} (hba : b ≤ a)
    (hdc : d ≤ c) : «expr • » a d + «expr • » b c ≤ «expr • » a c + «expr • » b d :=
  by
  rw [add_comm («expr • » a d), add_comm («expr • » a c)]
  exact smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul hba hdc
#align smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul' smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul'
smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Binary **rearrangement inequality**. -/
theorem smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul [contravariant_class M M (· + ·) (· ≤ ·)] {a b : k} {c d : M} (hab : a ≤ b)
    (hcd : c ≤ d) : «expr • » a d + «expr • » b c ≤ «expr • » a c + «expr • » b d :=
  by
  obtain ⟨b, rfl⟩ := exists_add_of_le hab
  obtain ⟨d, rfl⟩ := exists_add_of_le hcd
  rw [smul_add, add_right_comm, smul_add, ← add_assoc, add_smul _ _ d]
  rw [le_add_iff_nonneg_right] at hab hcd
  exact add_le_add_left (le_add_of_nonneg_right <| smul_nonneg hab hcd) _
#align smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul smul_add_smul_le_smul_add_smul

theorem eq_of_smul_eq_smul_of_neg_of_le (hab : «expr • » c a = «expr • » c b) (hc : c < 0) (h : a ≤ b) : a = b :=
